import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplRappVisite extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { arrayPhoto: [], date: '', magasin: '', commercial_id: '', client_id: '', remarque: '' } } componentDidMount() { if (JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))) != null) { var idRappVisite = this.props.location.state.idRappVisite; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_magasin/GetRapportVisiteById.php?id=' + idRappVisite).then(res => { this.setState({ arrayPhoto: res.data.allPhoto, date: res.data.date, commercial: res.data.commercial, client: res.data.client, remarque: res.data.remarque }) }) } else { document.location = '/' } } render() { return (

Rapport visite

{/* /.col-lg-12 */}
{/* /.row */}
{this.state.arrayPhoto.map((el, index) => )}
Photos visite
); } } export default withRouter(ExplRappVisite);
